Title: Ridicule
Writer: Rémi Waterhouse (scenario), Michel Fessler (screenplay), Eric Vicaut (collaboration), Rémi Waterhouse (dialogue)
Actors: Charles Berling, Jean Rochefort, Fanny Ardant, Judith Godrèche
Plot: In the periwigged and opulent France of Louis XVI, an unwitting nobleman soon discovers that survival at court demands both a razor wit and an acid tongue.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 21 wins & 15 nominations.
